name: Protocol
description: By signing below, you agree to follow the Protocol. Protocol is a program of strict rules created to make first contact with an alien life form that got shot down in the Arctic Circle.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7 or higher 64-bit Processor: i3-i5 4gen (or similar AMD) Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 650 (min 2 Gb) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5 4 Gen or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 8 GB available space
